SELECT Z.MATERIAL_NO, Z.MATERIAL_NUM, PM.MATER_SPEC, PM.MATER_DESC, PM.MATER_TYPE, PM.MATER_MKIND FROM (SELECT WPD.MATERIAL_NO, COUNT(WPD.MATERIAL_NO) AS MATERIAL_NUM FROM WBS_BIN T INNER JOIN WBS_PACKAGE_DATA WPD ON WPD.PACKAGE_GUID = T.PACKAGE_GUID GROUP BY WPD.MATERIAL_NO) Z LEFT JOIN PSB_MATERIAL PM ON PM.MATER_NO = Z.MATERIAL_NO
Z.MATERIAL_NO like '%'||#where.MATERIAL_NO#||'%'
ORDER BY MATERIAL_NO
